thread.title: Wonderful few days at the Haymarket -
thread.title_full: Wonderful few days at the Haymarket - Review of Haymarket Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: rhorst79
title: Wonderful few days at the Haymarket -
text:
Beautiful rooms. The bed was so comfortable. Great location. The staff took care of all our needs. I even broke a light bulb in the closet by accident. It was cleaned up immediately and with no charge.
I wish I could stay longer. We had breakfast included which was a nice additions. They will also call you a taxi to the airport if you wish and add it to your bill. Try the cocktails at the bar before dinner.
